divs: Sighting Detailsi was delivering a pizza off Palm City rd. heading south and i noticed a object around 500 ft up hovering and not moving what so ever and i stoped my car and got out to check it out and as i was staring at this object two balls of lights shot out two sides and the craft and went in different directions. The triangle object soon started heading North and then started blinking blue and flew off at a medium speed, not too fast. around a year before this my friends family was in there front yard having a party around 9:00 PM and they all noticed 5 bright white lights really high up shaped like a five point star. as they watched this for about a hour the lights slowly got closer together and eventuallys they started spinning around really fast, came together, and shot out in all different directions.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Stuart
There were no other sightings in Stuart on or around October 17th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Three bright orange lights in shape of triangle.
